titleStmt.title: Articles of peace made and concluded with the Irish rebels and papists by James Earle of Ormond ... also, a letter sent by Ormond to Col. Jones, Governour of Dublin, with his answer thereunto : and a representation of the Scotch Presbytery at Belfast in Ireland : upon all which are added observations.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
Milton, John, 1608-1674. Observations upon the articles of peace with the Irish rebels.

notesStmt.note: The "Observations" are attributed to John Milton. Cf. Bradshaw Irish collection, v. 2, no. 6959.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
